channel.description: Recent content in Pretty Crazy on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Korea Box Office: ‘My Daughter is a Zombie’ Leads Again as ‘Pretty Crazy’ Debuts Strong
item.description: Local film “My Daughter is a Zombie” held onto the No. 1 spot at the Korean box office for a third consecutive weekend, grossing $5.3 million from 763,403 admissions over Aug. 15–17. Accor
